entry.tran: （女人举止或衣着）像男人的，男性化的
entry.def: If you describe a woman as butch, you mean that she behaves or dresses in a masculine way. This use could cause offence.
If you describe a man as butch, you mean that he behaves in an extremely masculine way.

means.word_mean: 1. offensive terms for a lesbian who is noticeably masculine
1. used of men; markedly masculine in appearance or manner
